scripts.lint: echo Linting Javascript/Typescript... && %cd%/node_modules/.bin/eslint --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --fix --config .eslintrc.json --ignore-path .eslintignore . && echo Javascript/Typescript Linting succesful. No problems found.
scripts.build: npm run count && npm run lint && echo Building... && %cd%/node_modules/.bin/webpack -p --config ./webpack.prod.js
scripts.start: npm run count && npm run lint && echo Starting... && %cd%/node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server --config ./webpack.dev.js
scripts.count: echo Significant Lines of Code Count: && cloc --exclude-list-file=.code ./src
